name: JournalEntriesByPeriod
description: Retrieves journal entries within a specific date range for review.
training_phrases: show me this month's journal entries

name: ListChartOfAccounts
description: Shows the complete chart of accounts with all ledger heads.

name: CreateLedgerAccount
description: Creates a new ledger account in the chart of accounts.

name: AccountLedgerTransactions
description: Shows all transactions posted to a specific ledger account with details.

name: ListFixedAssets
description: Shows all fixed assets in the asset register with book values.

name: AssetDepreciationSchedule
description: Shows depreciation calculations and schedule for fixed assets.

name: BudgetUtilizationReport
description: Shows how much of the budget has been consumed vs remaining by category.

name: RevenueForecast
description: Projects future revenue based on pipeline, historical trends, and seasonality.

name: FinancialKPIDashboard
description: Shows key financial performance indicators — margins, ratios, DSO, DPO, etc.

name: GrossProfitMargin
description: Calculates gross profit margin percentage for a given period.
training_phrases: gross margin this month kitna hai

name: NetProfitMargin
description: Calculates net profit margin percentage for a given period.

name: DSOAndDPOAnalysis
description: Calculates Days Sales Outstanding (DSO) and Days Payable Outstanding (DPO).
training_phrases: how fast are we collecting from customers

name: WorkingCapitalAnalysis
description: Analyzes working capital position — current assets minus current liabilities.

name: CashConversionCycle
description: Calculates cash conversion cycle — how quickly cash moves through the business.
training_phrases: how long does cash cycle take

name: RevenueGrowthTrend
description: Shows revenue growth trend over multiple periods with percentage changes.

name: ExpenseGrowthTrend
description: Shows expense growth trend over multiple periods to identify cost escalation.

name: CustomerConcentrationRisk
description: Analyzes revenue concentration risk — how dependent we are on top customers.
training_phrases: top customer revenue share kitna hai
are we too dependent on one customer
how much revenue from top 5 customers
ek customer pe kitna depend hain

name: MonthlyCashBurnRate
description: Calculates monthly cash burn rate and projected cash runway.
training_phrases: how fast are we spending cash
when will we run out of cash

name: AuditTrailReport
description: Shows the complete audit trail of who changed what and when in financial records.
training_phrases: kya kya changes hue system mein

name: DuplicateTransactionCheck
description: Checks for potential duplicate entries in invoices, bills, and payments.
training_phrases: koi duplicate entry hai kya system mein

name: MissingDocumentSequence
description: Checks for gaps in document number sequences for invoices, bills, etc.

name: UnusualTransactionAlert
description: Identifies transactions that deviate from normal patterns or exceed thresholds.

name: Greeting
description: Responds to user greetings and salutations in English and Hindi.

name: Farewell
description: Responds to goodbye messages from the user.

name: Thanks
description: Responds to expressions of gratitude from the user.

name: Capabilities
description: Explains what Munimji can do and lists available features and modules.
training_phrases: tum kya kya kar sakte ho
show me what you can do
help me understand what you can do

name: Unclear
description: Handles unclear or ambiguous user queries that need clarification.
training_phrases: I don't know what to ask

name: DataExportRequest
description: Exports financial data or reports in various formats like CSV, Excel, or PDF.

name: SetReportingPeriod
description: Sets or changes the default date range / period for reports and queries.

name: CreateInvoice
description: Creates a new sales invoice for a customer with line items, amounts, and tax.
training_phrases: I want to create an invoice

name: UpdateInvoice
description: Modifies an existing invoice's details such as line items, amounts, or customer.

name: DeleteInvoice
description: Deletes or voids a draft invoice from the system permanently.
training_phrases: I want to delete this invoice

name: SendInvoiceEmail
description: Sends an invoice to the customer via email for payment.
training_phrases: share invoice with customer by email
send the bill to {{customerName}} by email

name: DuplicateInvoice
description: Creates a copy of an existing invoice for quick re-billing to the same or new customer.
training_phrases: make another invoice like this one

name: InvoiceByNumber
description: Retrieves a specific invoice by its number for detailed viewing.

name: InvoicesByCustomer
description: Retrieves all invoices for a specific customer with totals and statuses.

name: InvoicesByDateRange
description: Retrieves invoices created or issued within a specific date range.

name: InvoiceTotalByPeriod
description: Calculates total invoice value for a given period for revenue tracking.
training_phrases: how much did we invoice this month
is mahine ka total invoice kitna hai
sum of all invoices this year
how much have we billed this month

name: UnpaidInvoicesByCustomer
description: Shows unpaid/outstanding invoices for a specific customer.
training_phrases: how much does {{customerName}} owe on invoices
{{customerName}} ka baaki kitna hai invoices pe
what does {{customerName}} owe us on invoices

name: CreateBill
description: Creates a new purchase bill from a vendor with line items and tax details.

name: PendingBillsList
description: Lists all unpaid or partially paid vendor bills with amounts and due dates.
training_phrases: show me what we owe vendors
bills due for payment this week

name: OverdueBillsList
description: Shows vendor bills that have passed their payment due date.
training_phrases: which bills are late for payment

name: BillsByVendor
description: Retrieves all bills from a specific vendor with amounts and statuses.
training_phrases: what do we owe {{vendorName}} on bills

name: ApproveBill
description: Approves a pending bill for payment processing in the workflow.
training_phrases: mark bill as approved for payment

name: BillTotalByPeriod
description: Calculates total bill/purchase value for a given period.
training_phrases: how much did we spend on bills
is mahine ka total bill kitna hai
sum of all vendor bills this year
total payable amount this week from bills
how much do we owe in total
total billed by vendors this FY

name: ListRecurringInvoices
description: Shows all recurring invoice profiles set up for automatic generation.

name: CreateRecurringInvoice
description: Sets up a new recurring invoice profile for automatic monthly/weekly generation.

name: CreateProformaInvoice
description: Creates a new proforma invoice or estimate for a potential customer.

name: ConvertProformaToInvoice
description: Converts an approved proforma invoice into a final sales invoice.
training_phrases: convert this estimate to final invoice

name: CreateDebitNote
description: Creates a debit note for a customer for additional charges or corrections.

name: PettyCashBalance
description: Shows petty cash or cash in hand balance for office expenses.

name: ExpenseByEmployee
description: Shows expenses grouped by employee who submitted them for review.
training_phrases: kaunse employee ne kitna kharcha kiya

name: StockTransferBetweenWarehouses
description: Transfers stock between two warehouses or godown locations.

name: PurchaseReturnEntry
description: Records goods returned to a vendor with quantity and reason.

name: BatchExpiryReport
description: Shows batch/lot details for inventory items including upcoming expiry dates.

name: AssetDisposalReport
description: Shows assets that have been disposed, sold, scrapped, or written off.

name: BudgetVarianceReport
description: Shows variance between budgeted and actual amounts by account or department.

name: RecurringJournalEntries
description: Shows recurring journal entries set up for automatic monthly posting.

name: TopExpenseCategories
description: Shows the top spending categories ranked by amount with percentages.
training_phrases: sabse zyada kharcha kahan ho raha hai
where do we spend most money

name: BreakEvenAnalysis
description: Calculates the break-even point — minimum revenue needed to cover all costs.
training_phrases: kitna revenue chahiye break even ke liye

name: ProfitabilityTrend
description: Shows profitability trend over multiple periods with margin analysis.

name: VendorConcentrationRisk
description: Analyzes spending concentration risk — how dependent on top vendors.
training_phrases: are we too dependent on one vendor
how much spending on top 5 vendors
ek vendor pe kitna depend hain

name: YearEndClosingChecklist
description: Shows year-end financial closing checklist items and their completion status.

name: GSTRateWiseSummary
description: Shows transaction summary grouped by GST rate slab (5%, 12%, 18%, 28%).

name: GSTPaymentHistory
description: Shows history of GST payments and challans deposited with the government.
training_phrases: how much GST paid so far

name: CustomerCreditLimit
description: Shows or sets credit limit for a customer to manage credit risk.
training_phrases: show credit limits for all customers

name: VendorPaymentTerms
description: Shows or manages payment terms configured for a specific vendor.
training_phrases: show payment terms for all vendors
{{vendorName}} ko kitne din mein pay karna hai

name: MultiCurrencyRates
description: Shows current exchange rates configured for multi-currency transactions.

name: CashPositionSummary
description: Comprehensive cash position summary — bank balances, receivables due, payables due, net position.
training_phrases: where do we stand on cash
how much cash do we really have

name: WeeklyFinancialDigest
description: Generates a weekly executive financial digest with key metrics and changes.

name: FinancialHealthScore
description: Generates an overall financial health score based on key ratios and metrics.
training_phrases: how healthy is our business financially

name: TopRisksAndAlerts
description: Shows top financial risks and alerts needing immediate CFO attention.

name: CreditExposureSummary
description: Shows total credit exposure across all customers with risk categorization.
training_phrases: kitna credit diya hua hai total

name: LiquidityRatio
description: Calculates current ratio and quick ratio for liquidity health assessment.
training_phrases: current assets to current liabilities ratio
can we meet short term obligations

name: DebtToEquityRatio
description: Calculates debt-to-equity ratio for leverage and solvency analysis.

name: RecordCustomerAdvance
description: Records an advance payment received from a customer before invoicing.
training_phrases: advance payment from customer record karo

name: ProfitAndLossByProject
description: Shows P&L broken down by project for project profitability analysis.

name: ProfitAndLossByLocation
description: Shows P&L broken down by business location/branch for regional analysis.

name: AccountReceivableTurnover
description: Calculates accounts receivable turnover ratio and collection efficiency.
training_phrases: how many times receivables turn over

name: AccountPayableTurnover
description: Calculates accounts payable turnover ratio and payment efficiency.
training_phrases: how quickly are we paying vendors
how many times payables turn over

name: SwitchEntity
description: Switches to a different business entity in a multi-entity setup.

name: EntityWiseComparisonReport
description: Compares financial performance across multiple business entities.

name: SalaryExpenseSummary
description: Shows salary and payroll expense summary for a period.

name: TaxSavingOpportunities
description: Identifies potential tax saving opportunities based on current financial data.
training_phrases: kahan se tax bacha sakte hain

name: ComplianceCalendar
description: Shows all upcoming compliance deadlines — GST, TDS, ROC, audit, etc.
training_phrases: kya kya file karna hai is mahine

name: SalesOrdersByCustomer
description: Lists all sales orders for a specific customer with statuses.

name: SalesOrderFulfillmentStatus
description: Shows fulfillment progress of sales orders — shipped vs pending quantities.
training_phrases: how much is shipped on this order

name: ExpiredQuotations
description: Shows quotations that have passed their validity date and need follow-up.

name: PurchaseOrderByNumber
description: Retrieves a specific purchase order by its number for detailed viewing.

name: PurchaseOrderReceiptStatus
description: Shows goods receipt status against purchase orders — received vs pending.
training_phrases: kitna maal aaya PO ke against
what's left to receive on PO

name: AccountBalanceEnquiry
description: Shows the current balance of a specific ledger account.

name: InvoiceTaxSummary
description: Shows tax collected on invoices grouped by tax type or rate for compliance.
training_phrases: kitna tax collect hua invoices pe

name: InvoiceAgeAnalysis
description: Shows aging analysis of all invoices grouped by age buckets for collection management.

name: BulkPaymentProcessing
description: Processes multiple vendor payments at once for batch payment runs.
training_phrases: sab pending bills ek saath pay karo

name: PaymentReminderToCustomer
description: Sends payment reminder to customers with overdue invoices.

name: InterCompanyTransactions
description: Shows or creates inter-company transactions between related entities.

name: TDSCertificateStatus
description: Shows status of Form 16/16A TDS certificate generation and issuance.

name: GSTNonComplianceAlert
description: Shows GST compliance issues and alerts that need immediate attention.

name: InventoryToSalesRatio
description: Calculates inventory to sales ratio for stock efficiency analysis.

name: CustomerPaymentBehavior
description: Analyzes customer payment patterns — who pays on time, who pays late.
training_phrases: kaunse customers late pay karte hain

name: VendorPaymentBehavior
description: Analyzes our payment patterns to vendors — on-time vs late payment analysis.
training_phrases: are we paying vendors on time
kya hum vendors ko time pe pay kar rahe hain
